entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 02:55 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -24.5°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -28.2°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
